home.title: Front-End Web Developer
home.introPara: An expert Front-end Developer based in Mumbai, India

about.aboutSect: Hi, I'm Mohd Affan, a passionate self-taught Frontend Developer specializing in React.js. My journey into web development began with a curiosity to create dynamic and visually appealing websites. I have honed my skills in JavaScript, React, Tailwind CSS, and Sass, and I’m currently exploring Next.js and Redux Toolkit to expand my expertise. I enjoy turning ideas into reality through clean, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces. My goal is to constantly learn and stay updated with the latest technologies in the ever-evolving web development field. I'm eager to collaborate on exciting projects and bring creative solutions to life. When I'm not coding, you’ll find me exploring new technologies or working on personal projects to sharpen my skills.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: This e-commerce website is a modern, user-friendly platform that offers a smooth and interactive shopping experience.

ReactFilter.title: React-Advanced-Filter
ReactFilter.description: Advanced Filtering in React | Smart Search, Category & Brand Filters, Price Range Selection. I recently built an Advanced Filtering project in React that enhances user experience with powerful search and filtering options.

flags.title: World API Flag
flags.description: Country Flags app showcasing every nation's flag fetched dynamically via API for an interactive and educational experience.

multiForm.title: Multi-Level Form
multiForm.description: Multi-level form app with step-by-step user inputs, ensuring seamless data collection and smooth navigation.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Personal portfolio showcasing skills, projects, and achievements with a sleek design and interactive user experience.

ticTacToe.title: Tic Tac Toe
ticTacToe.description: Mind game in React where users match pairs of cards, testing memory and concentration skills in an engaging way.
